info.title: Domakin API
info.description: API documentation for Domakin platform - Version 1

get.description: Returns a list of all publicly visible properties. Only properties with a past release_timestamp and status Pending (1), Rent (2), or Taken (3) are included. Titles and descriptions are translated according to the Accept-Language header.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Preferred language for titles and descriptions (e.g. en, nl). Defaults to 'en' if omitted.

data.description: List of properties formatted for public listing

property.example: Spacious room with canal view, 15mÂ². Shared kitchen and bathroom.

link.description: Public property page path (locale-prefixed when not en). Use with app base URL.

description.property: Spacious room with canal view, 15mÂ². Shared kitchen and bathroom.
Furnished studio, 25mÂ². Private kitchen and bathroom.

get.summary: Test Signal integration with the latest property

post.summary: Create payment link for a property (Admin only)

get.summary: Get all rentings for a property by property_id (admin)

patch.summary: Update renting status and internal note (admin)
